Articles.Content:
Hey there. I am a Senior in Comp Sci. and I am addicted to KSP. I found out about this gem from the Nightstar Zoo Forums for Schlock Mercenary. I'll wait here, a bit, while you read all 4000+ strips of this Thoomy goodness.

Anywho, enough plugging my favorite webcomic. I have built several ships using both standard and modded parts, I am currently working on a series of Sub-Orbital Test rockets used for testing a series of orbital maneuvering vehicles that I am using to test a different braking procedure. I have also built several large rockets with the purpose of attaining high orbit. I'll show them off, assuming I can remember all the parts I DL'd.

Aaaaaand yep, that's it.

Happy rocketeering.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
